page.title: 20Law and Order in Llanelli.
page.content: This block has a Police Station and a Magistrates Court Building housing three Court Rooms,Probation Officer's accomadation,Registrar's Chambers and the Magistrates Clerk's office.The incidence of serious crimes, such as murder,are fortunately rare in Llanelli. There is some evidence of Drug abuse,vandalism and there are some arrests for being drunk. Acknowledgments. Information and writing compiled by the children and staff of Pentip V.A.Primary School with the help of the Llanelli Library staff.Thanks are due to Jenkins' Tours for the loan of their Mini Bus,Mr.C.Thomas for taking the photographs,Mr.Brynmor Voyle of the Llanelli Civic Trust and Mr.Alan Bowen Thomas,Chief Executive of the Llanelli Borough Council.
